profile.logout_text: Is u seker dat u wil afmeld?

force_narrow.description: Dit sal die sybalk by aanvang verberg, soortgelyk aan die mobiele ervaring.

customize_sidebar.header: Change the order and hide items from the sidebar
customize_sidebar.description: You can also press and hold the header of the sidebar to activate edit mode.

vibrate.description: Enable or disable vibration on this device when controlling devices.

enable_shortcuts.description: Enable or disable keyboard shortcuts for performing various actions in the UI.

suspend.description: Should we close the connection to the server after being hidden for 5 minutes?

push_notifications.error_use_https: Vereis dat SSL gedeaktiveer is vir gebruikerskoopelvlak.

add_device_prompt.title: What should this device be called?

time_zone.description: Choose the time zone to use for displaying times.

first_weekday.description: Choose the starting day for calendars.

themes.link_promo: Kom meer te wete oor temas

dashboard.description: Pick a default dashboard for this device.

change_password.error_new_mismatch: Entered new password values do not match
change_password.error_new_is_old: New password must be different than current password
change_password.logout_all_sessions: Do you want to log out from all devices?
change_password.logout_all_sessions_text: This will require you to log in again on all devices with your new password, including this one.
change_password.delete_failed: Not all devices could be logged out

mfa.confirm_disable: Is u seker u wil {name} deaktiveer?

refresh_tokens.description: Elke verfris-tekseenheid verteenwoordig 'n aanmeldingssessie. Verfris-tekseenhede sal outomaties verwyder word wanneer u op meld af klik. Die volgende verfris-tekseenhede is tans aktief vir u rekening.
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete: Is u seker u wil die verfris-tekseenheid vir {name} skrap?
refresh_tokens.confirm_delete_all: Are you sure you want to delete all refresh tokens? Your current session token will not be removed. Your long-lived access tokens will not be removed.
refresh_tokens.delete_failed: Het misluk om die verfris-tekseenheid te skrap.
refresh_tokens.current_token_tooltip: Nie in staat om huidige verfris-tekseenheid te skrap nie

long_lived_access_tokens.description: Skep langlewende-toegangs-tekseenhede om u skripte in staat te stel om met u Home Assistant-instansie te kommunikeer. Elke tekseenheid sal geldig wees vir 10 jaar vanaf die skepping. Die volgende langlewende-toegangs-tekseenheid is tans aktief.
long_lived_access_tokens.learn_auth_requests: Leer hoe om geverifieerde versoeke te maak.
long_lived_access_tokens.confirm_delete: Is u seker u wil die toegangs-tekseenheid vir {name} skrap?
long_lived_access_tokens.delete_failed: Het misluk om die toegangs-tekseenheid te skrap.
long_lived_access_tokens.create_failed: Het misluk om die toegangs-tekseenheid te maak.
long_lived_access_tokens.name: Naam
long_lived_access_tokens.prompt_copy_token: Kopieer u toegangs-tekseenheid. Dit sal nie weer gewys word nie.
long_lived_access_tokens.empty_state: U het nog geen langlewende-toegangs-tekseenhede nie.
